metadata.name: Visual Studio Code Tunnel Service Installation
metadata.comment: Detects the installation of VsCode tunnel (code-tunnel) as a service.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tunnel ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('service')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('internal-run')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tunnel-service.log')))

output.summary: Detects the installation of VsCode tunnel (code-tunnel) as a service.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate installation of code-tunnel as a service References: https://ipfyx.fr/post/visual-studio-code-tunnel/, https://badoption.eu/blog/2023/01/31/code_c2.html, https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/remote/tunnels
